message.content:
cs.CR, cs.PL, cs.SE, cs.LO, cs.SY

The paper discusses the design and testing of information-flow control mechanisms, which is a topic related to computer security (cs.CR). The use of QuickCheck, a property-based random-testing tool, suggests a focus on programming languages and software engineering (cs.PL and cs.SE). The paper also discusses the use of invariants and noninterference properties, which are topics related to logic and verification (cs.LO). Finally, the paper proposes a novel flow-sensitive dynamic enforcement mechanism, which suggests a focus on systems and control (cs.SY).
